title: 3 Easy Steps to View Messages on Snapchat

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. Snapchat's icon is yellow with a white ghost in it.

steps.title: Tap the speech bubble icon.
steps.content: Tap the speech bubble icon. It's located at the bottom left corner of the screen. Doing so will open the Chat screen.

steps.title: Tap on a username.
steps.content: Tap on a username. A conversation screen will appear with that user, allowing you to see new messages from them. When you have a new message from a friend, a blue arrow will appear next to their name on your Chat screen.
